oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Boyd Monument
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr. John Mason Boyd "Our Beloved Physician" monument on the corner of Gay Street and Main Street, Knoxville, TN. Near the Knox County Courthouse (in background at left). Four men leaning against fence at right. Russell Harrison Photograph Collection: Traveler's Protective Association (TPA) folder.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments; Physicians; Courthouses;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Russell Harrison Photograph Collection: Traveler's Protective Association (TPA) folder
